name: Wang fried
description:
Game introduction

Players need to play mercenaries fighting other soldiers in a warehouse. There are 6 different weapons in the game: machine gun, colt, shotgun, heavy sniper, heavy machine gun and Gatling. You can flexibly switch these 6 different weapons to kill the enemy in the game.

Game features

Players can snipe at any position in the warehouse, fight with the enemy with heavy machine guns, and can realize two-stage jump to challenge their limit scores when their life is exhausted!
